title: Content Classifier

detailed_design.description: LLM or rule-based inspection of file contents (and optionally metadata) to produce labels or suggested destination for auto-sorting. Input: path + optional content snippet; output: category or folder suggestion. Integrates with File Watchdog output.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Accept path and optional content snippet. 2. Use LLM or rules to classify into category/destination. 3. Return suggested category or folder. 4. Configurable or safe defaults; integrate with File Watchdog events.

acceptance_criteria: Classifies a subset of file types

user_stories.story: As a user, I want new files to be automatically suggested for organisation.

dependencies: PBI-041 (File Watchdog); PBI-022 UI can mock this until PBI-042 is implemented
